info.name: camara-device-identifier-api-0.0.2
info.description:
The Device Identifier API return details about the device (i.e. UE) currently being used by a specified mobile subscriber. The following information can be returned:
- A unique network identifier for the specific device itself (IMEI SV and IMEI)
- A network identifier for the device make and model (IMEI Type Allocation Code)
- Device manufacturer name
- Device manufacturer model

Information for the manufacturer name and model will, where provided, be taken from the [GSMA IMEI database](https://www.gsma.com/aboutus/workinggroups/terminal-steering-group/imei-database)


Contact Support:
 Email: sp-dvi@lists.camaraproject.org

item.name: Get details about the device being used by a specified mobile subscriber

header.description: 3GPP network access identifier for the subscription being used by the device
MSISDN in E.164 format (starting with country code) of the mobile subscription being used by the device. Optionally prefixed with '+'.
The public IP allocated to the device. If an IPv4 address is specified, the public port must also be specified in the "Port" header
The public port alloacted to the device. This is only required if an IPv4 public IP is also specified.

The public port alloacted to the device. This is only required if an IPv4 public IP is also specified.
